name: Rae
appearance: Wiry novice with wind-tangled hair, a river-blue scarf, and ink-stained fingers. Smells faintly of reedwater and brass polish.
character: Earnest and brave with a quick laugh; curiosity often outruns caution.
talents: hears aqueduct pipes hum in distinct ‘voices’
dreams: rebalance water so terrace bells ring in gratitude, not grief
reunite her scattered family on a dry step
see the Blue Maw from beneath with a safe line to the surface
secrets: mapped hidden bleed-valves feeding Syndicate cisterns
stole a vial of hush-ink she has not dared use
meets Kema in secret to pass warnings between Choir and docks
